text: Portishead (, with the stress on head) are an English musical group from Bristol. The band is named after the nearby town of the same name, west of Bristol.Portishead and Bristol on Google Maps Portishead is Geoff Barrow, Beth Gibbons, and Adrian Utley, while sometimes using a fourth member Dave McDonald; an engineer on Dummy.The Rock Hard Times: Dave McDonald ==References== Category:1991 establishments in England Category:1990s British music groups Category:2000s British music groups Category:2010s British music groups Category:Organisations based in Bristol Category:Musical groups established in 1991 Category:Musical trios Category:Trip hop groups
title: Portishead (band)
